results.content: 2023/01/06. CES 2023 is here !. Visit our stand at LVCC Central Hall 18790 in Las Vegas 5 - 8 January 2023. WJP is ready to see you with our brand new image. WJP has been participating in CES Las Vegas every year for more than 15 years. As the largest international consumer electronics show in the United States, CES is where global leading ...
results.raw_content:
2023 / CES / Las Vegas
CES 2023 is here！Visit our stand at LVCC Central Hall 18790 in Las Vegas 5 - 8 January 2023. WJP is ready to see you with our brand new image.
WJP has been participating in CES Las Vegas every year for more than 15 years.
As the largest international consumer electronics show in the United States, CES is where global leading brands release the latest future trending products. To present the latest packaging design and material technology at this annual international exhibition, WJP always made every effort to prepare.
WJP has built trusted long-term relationships and offer our packaging service for many companies across North America. After the long gap caused by the pandemic, this year, we are ready to present at CES 2023！ And welcome all exhibitors and attendees to drop by our stand for a minute and have a chat to see how we can help your business.
Our Topic for CES2023:
In response to the carbon tax policies implemented by countries around the world, WJP has been researching and promoting sustainable packaging for the past year, such as：
☑100% recycled pulp paper boxes
☑Sturdy and functional product packaging design (that can increase users' willingness to reuse)
☑Less materials usage
☑PCR recycled plastic and recycled paper packaging.
The issue of sustainability has also led to an increase in demand for PCR plastic packaging, encouraging WJP and suppliers to continue innovating and researching the application of PCR plastic material and recycled pulp packaging.
In addition to the latest packaging debuting at CES 2023, be sure to continue following WJP's website and Facebook for timely updates on WJP's domestic and international exhibitions in 2023 and other new developments in sustainable packaging.

2024 / CES / Las Vegas
CES 2024 is here！Visit our stand at LVCC- Central Hall NO. 22444 in Las Vegas 9 - 12 January 2024. WJP is ready to see you with our brand new image.
WJP has been participating in CES Las Vegas every year for more than 16 years.
As the largest international consumer electronics show in the United States, CES is where global leading brands release the latest future trending products. To present the latest packaging design and material technology at this annual international exhibition, WJP always made every effort to prepare.
WJP has built trusted long-term relationships and offer our packaging service for many companies across North America. After the long gap caused by the pandemic, this year, we are ready to present at CES 2024！ And welcome all exhibitors and attendees to drop by our stand for a minute and have a chat to see how we can help your business.
Our Topic for CES2024:
In response to the carbon tax policies implemented by countries around the world, WJP has been researching and promoting sustainable packaging for the past year, such as：
☑100% recycled pulp paper boxes
☑Sturdy and functional product packaging design (that can increase users' willingness to reuse)
☑Less materials usage
☑PCR recycled plastic and recycled paper packaging.
The issue of sustainability has also led to an increase in demand for PCR plastic packaging, encouraging WJP and suppliers to continue innovating and researching the application of PCR plastic material and recycled pulp packaging.
In addition to the latest packaging debuting at CES 2024, be sure to continue following WJP's website and Facebook for timely updates on WJP's domestic and international exhibitions in 2024 and other new developments in sustainable packaging.

results.title: WJP Packaging
results.content: Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics Industry Co., Ltd. provides the advanced technology and compete packaging solution. We are internationally recognized for our commitment to our customers, our quality, our innovation, and professional management. WJP is ISO 9001:2000, and QC0800 certified.
results.raw_content:
Connecting...
We are connecting you with a representative of WJP Packaging.
Maybe you can help us serve you better answering a few questions:
[Agent] has invited you to a live chat
[Name]
WJP Packaging
WJP Packaging
With a wide range of design with various materials, Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics is where sophisticated packaging is created.
We are internationally recognized for our commitment to our customers, our quality, our innovation, and professional management. WJP is ISO 9001:2000, and QC0800 certified. Our dedication to a comfortable, safe, environmentally sensitive and rewarding work environment ensures the dedication of our professional staff’s dedication to you, our customer.
Our core philosophy of “Consistent Outstanding Quality and Technical Innovation” is our constant goal. We have been rewarded with a reputation for excellence by our worldwide suppliers and longstanding clients, including : HTC, Motorola, Kingston, Audio Technica, Foxconn, Johnson & Johnson, Wilson Electronics Inc., PenPower Technology Ltd. , and Nan Ya Plastics Corporation, to name but a few.
WJP’s core philosophy is the nucleus of our longstanding success and guarantees a vibrant future in an increasingly challenging global market.
A production environment of the highest caliber culminates in a product of superior quality. The main office for WJP accommodates our Sales, R & D, Design and Administration Teams in a bright, open, collaborative environment wherein cutting edge resource planning, design and communication technologies are utilized.
The plant facilities accommodate our mould forming, millwright, production, quality control and logistic teams in a highly clean, dust-free plant, housing 3D plastic-thermo-forming machine lines. Superior equipment design and ergonomic layout ensure the best working environment for WJP’s production professionals. The care WJP has put into the production environment for its support staff contributes to the pride each employee enjoys when satisfying each customer.
WJP's Customized Packaging Design

results.title: Corporate Social Responsibility in WJP packaging company
results.content: Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics Industry company has been certified with ISO 14001 regulations since 2015. ... Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics (WJP) helped by designing and manufacturing the TaiwanBox, in cooperation with Dr. Hsien-Yung Lai's team. ... Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics Industry Co., Ltd. +886-2-2223-5365; Projects. Industry; Packaging Styles; Packaging ...
results.raw_content:
Corporate Social Responsibility
WJP devotes ourselves to produce packaging with the supply chain locally in Taiwan by lean manufacturing, in addition, material transportation from site to site in northern Taiwan can reduce carbon emission before consolidation packages to worldwide.
Responding to sustainability, on the other side, we’re constantly looking for new eco material in the market and encourage our customer to move toward sustainable consumption.
ISO14001
Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics Industry company has been certified with ISO 14001 regulations since 2015.
We always make efforts to minimize environmental impact during product life cycle.
Responses To COVID-19
When the Covid-19 virus started to spread out across the world and people became infected, healthcare workers came under increased stress and danger. We were all forced to change our lifestyles and we became more socially aware, society wanted to help: some offered financial help while others offered various essential requirements. Expertise was also made available by many professionals and companies.
Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics (WJP) helped by designing and manufacturing the TaiwanBox, in cooperation with Dr. Hsien-Yung Lai’s team. The Taiwanbox is a creative solution to help protect healthcare providers and contributes to our community – thus fulfilling a main aim of the WJP Mission Statement. WJP have built their reputation on their ability to respond quickly to requirements as their design and manufacturing units are located together.
Corporate Citizenship
Learning
WJP’s core philosophy is believing in “keep learning and always go beyond yourself”.
We offer employee continuing education to each employee every year and encourage them to develop personally and professionally.
Every year, we host technical seminar with our in-house professionals or invite experts in different areas to give us a speech.
Physical Wellness
WJP provide regular health checks to each member, and give a hand to members in need.
To keep a cleaner and safer working environment, WJP maintain our workplace with a routine for sanitizing and cleaning.
Relaxation
Work-life balance is always our first concern when it comes to effective and productive workplace.

results.title: WJP thermoforming plastic packaging company frequently asked questions
results.content: We can design packaging that is the most suitable for your product according to your needs and wants. Q4: ... Wan Jeou Pyng Plastics Industry Co., Ltd. +886-2-2223-5365; Projects. Industry; Packaging Styles; Packaging Materials; Industry; Packaging Styles; Packaging Materials; Our Process. Project Development;
results.raw_content:
FAQs
WJP has a fully automated production design program which reduces cut-off waste and a complete waste recycling system which allows the discarded plastic material to be recycled and reused, thus reducing waste.
WJP is certified by ISO9001:2008, a testament to our innovation, quality and professional management.
We are also certified in QC080000. The items we have passed are 2002/95/EC (“RoHS”) Hazardous Substance Process Management and 94/62/EC (“Packaging”) Packaging Materials Hazardous Substances Detection. With these international certifications, our customers can be confident in our product quality, safety and production practices.
WJP provides customized unique packaging for almost any type of product. We can design packaging that is the most suitable for your product according to your needs and wants.
We provide you complete package planning and design, including the appearance and functionality of the packaging, the combination of paper and plastic materials for the packaging, and production of the package. We also help you to manage your overall costs for transportation and overall packaging delivery, thereby reducing your costs.
WJP has expanded its production chain to other locations , including mainland China. Please contact our staff if you need our service in mainland China. (E-mail：sales@wjp.com.tw)
WJP has been a leader in design, research and development for more than three decades. Our aim in establishing our own design department was to create packaging for our customers that is functional, beautiful and desirable in appearance.
We provide you with overall packaging planning. WJP provides our customer with the package material that best suits customer need and demand. If you have further questions or need our service, please do not hesitate to contact us.
